relatedBlades.title: Network security solutions
relatedBlades.subtitle: Secure and strengthen your enterprise network with Cloudflare's integrated network security solutions
relatedBlades.copy: Enterprises need unified, layered security solutions that can be applied across all endpoints and users — no matter where they're located. Cloudflare can help.

relatedBlades.title: Traditional network architecture isn't built to secure today's enterprise networks.
relatedBlades.copy:
As the architecture of enterprise networks continues to evolve, so do the methods by which enterprises secure their networks, users, and data.

With the rise of remote work and the ongoing shift to the cloud, traditional architectures and security appliances — custom-built MPLS networks and an impossible-to-maintain patchwork of hardware boxes and tools — can no longer meet the needs of the modern enterprise network, forcing organizations to reevaluate their approach to [network security](https://www.cloudflare.com/network-services/solutions/enterprise-network-security/).

features.title: Overly permissive access policies introduce risk
features.description: VPNs grant excessive trust to users by default, exposing corporate networks to security risks like potential data loss, malicious insider threats, and more.

features.title: Sophisticated cyber attacks leave networks vulnerable
features.description: As DDoS attacks, ransomware, and other security threats increase in sophistication and frequency, enterprises need to employ proactive mitigation strategies.

features.title: Artificial chokepoints cause latency
features.description: Traditional solutions for inspecting traffic and mitigating attacks often result in unwanted performance tradeoffs, slowing down applications and impairing end user experience.

features.title: Unmanaged devices are susceptible to phishing and malware
features.description: In a BYOD environment, employee devices may be targeted by harmful code disguised as innocuous plugins and software extensions — which can then infect other network devices.

features.title: Security teams have poor visibility into network movement
features.description: Too many point solutions make it difficult for IT teams to easily monitor user behavior and respond to threats as they develop.

relatedBlades.title: It's time to move your network perimeter to the edge.

features.title: Create and enforce uniform security policies
features.description: Replace VPN connections with universal [Zero Trust](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/security/glossary/what-is-zero-trust/) policies that can be applied to all employees and devices, regardless of location.

features.title: Get ahead of attacks with ever-improving threat intelligence
features.description: Identify malicious traffic patterns from bots, vulnerability exploits, and other attacks, so your network is protected from new and emerging threats as soon as they arise.

features.title: Inspect network traffic without performance tradeoffs
features.description: Apply advanced and automated mitigation techniques via single-pass inspection, instead of backhauling traffic through scrubbing centers.

features.title: Maintain visibility from a single control pane
features.description: Manage network access and monitor threats on a unified dashboard — no layering incompatible tools or configuring expensive hardware appliances.

features.title: Scale network security as your enterprise grows
features.description: Choose a global edge network that seamlessly scales as your business grows, enabling you to mitigate attacks, accelerate traffic, and protect your users from any location.

Employees can connect to the tools they need so simply teams don't even know Cloudflare is powering the backend. It just works."

relatedBlades.title: Secure and scale your network with Cloudflare One.
relatedBlades.copy:
[Cloudflare One](https://www.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/) is a global, cloud-based network security solution built for enterprises that need to connect and secure their workforces — without leaning on legacy security appliances, juggling multiple point solutions, or sacrificing visibility and control over the security of their networks.

With Cloudflare, every network security service is delivered from a vast edge network spanning over %{DataCenterCount} cities in %{CountryCount} countries. That means attacks are automatically mitigated close to the source, network traffic is routed across the quickest and most efficient paths, and access policies can be uniformly applied across your workforce, no matter where your employees are located.

Keep reading to discover how Cloudflare protects enterprise networks with our suite of scalable network security services.
